name: Zenith 52 Stationary Table
descr:
52-Zenith Stationary Adjusting Table

A full featured stationary adjusting table that you can depend on. Anatomically designed to complement a wide range of adjusting techniques. 

Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty 
Tilt Headpiece 
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser 
Soft Hinged Dorsal 
Swingaway Abdominal- Adjustable Tension 
Slide & Crank Pelvic 
Adjustable Front Section 
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion 
Standard without drops 
Chrome Base Finish 
Sensation Upholstery in a variety of colors 
Table Length 62 
Table Height 20, 22, 24, or 26 
Table Width 24 
Cushion Width 18 
Table Weight 160 lbs. depending on options
